snippet: Venezuelan plumber Marcos Heredia scoured 20 pharmacies in one day but could not find crucial medicines to stop his epileptic 8-year-old from convulsions that caused irreparable brain damage late last year....

headline.main: NBCUniversal Invested $500 Million in Snap Inc as Part of IPO
headline.print_headline: NBCUniversal Invested $500 Million in Snap Inc as Part of IPO

lead_paragraph: Venezuelan plumber Marcos Heredia scoured 20 pharmacies in one day but could not find crucial medicines to stop his epileptic 8-year-old from convulsions that caused irreparable brain damage late last year.
